titles.title: Returning to the Senate the bill S. 729.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on the privileged resolution which directs that the House return the bill S. 729 and accompanying papers to the Senate because the contents of that bill violate the privileges of the House under the Constitution with regard to tariffs.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/21/1994--Introduced. Returns to the Senate S. 729 (amending the Toxic Substances Control Act to reduce the levels of lead in the environment) because in the opinion of the House of Representatives it contravenes the U.S. Constitution and infringes on the privileges of the House.
